entry.title: Friday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 9. POP 30%
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. 30 percent chance of light snow late this evening and overnight. Fog patches developing overnight. Wind north 20 km/h becoming light early this evening. Low minus 9. Wind chill minus 11 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CDT Friday 21 April 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Periods of light snow. High zero. POP 30%
